类 Statistics

java.lang.Object
  Statistics

public class Statistics
extends Object

The class Statistics accumulates information about a series of games:

  1. Number of game played
  2. Number of times the switching strategy was successful
  3. Number of times the switching strategy was not successful
  4. Number of times each door has the prize behind it
  5. Number of times each door was chosen by the player
  6. Number of times each door was open by the host

作者：
gvj (gvj@eecs.uottawa.ca)

          Initializes the statistics.

构造方法详细信息

Statistics

public Statistics()
Initializes the statistics.

方法详细信息

updateStatistics

public void updateStatistics(Door door1,
                             Door door2,
                             Door door3)
Updates statistics after one game.

参数：
door1 - the first door in the game
door2 - the second door in the game
door3 - the third door in the game

toString

public String toString()
覆盖：
类 Object 中的 toString
返回：
Returns the complete statistics information

toCSV

public String toCSV()
返回：
Returns the complete statistics information in CSV format
